name: Space Hopper
overview: A fun educational math game published by Green Valley Publishing, Inc. Under their ShareData label and part of the "Let's Count" collection. Let's Count helps young children of 4 years and above with early numerical skills for the numbers 0 to 9. Space Hopper gives practice in discriminating whether there are more, less or equal quantities of two objects. Your child's task is to drive the terratruck and load up the space hopper from the space store.
